column3: “By far the best I've had in a while. I sometimes get anxious after smoking high stavia strains and found the indica strains work best for my anxiety and stress. I like that Dream Berry relaxes me but I can still function around the house in a nice, euphoric calm without my brain stressing about stupid stuff. It tastes great too. I'll buy this one again for sure but will continue to try other indica stains as I'm only...”

“Let me start by saying this. I had only bought about an eighth to try it out. first 2 pulls and i was instantly in love with this strain. it doesn't hit hard on you. It gently creeps up. Youre up in the clouds before you even realize it. A very relaxing high. I would definitely recommend this to all of you. it's top 10 material. Absolute top shelf stuff”
“This indica was a very relaxed feel. I felt great and happy started to get a little lazy and just set down and relaxed loved it.”
“It was very mood-lifting. Not an overbearing high. Solid full body high. Would recommend.”
“Just got some dream berry concentrate by fume factory, very fruity diesel taste, only took a little one and feel extremely relaxed. Great for after a long day or before bed.”
“This weed has a high that is similar to blue dream except once this one is over u hit the ground harder. The flavor is a delicious sweet berry flavor with a tangy grapefruit aftertaste 4/5”
“Vet nice sweet berry taste. Quick effects very good pain reliever and relaxing while uplifting. I don't feel lazy but I don't feel energy either with this strain. Definitely makes me hungry though.”
“Love this strain, smoke it before school and I feel so much more focused. Amazing.”
“Vet nice sweet berry taste. Quick effects very good pain reliever and relaxing while uplifting. I don't feel lazy but I don't feel energy either with this strain. Definitely makes me hungry though.”
“This stuff is great. Me and my bro got completely knocked off our feet after only two cigarette sized joints... We didn't even get to smoke the blunt we made from it.”
“Love this strain, smoke it before school and I feel so much more focused. Amazing.”

“I like to smoke just a couple hours before going to bed. It's name really fits. I sleep well and have pleasant dreams and awake feeling fully refreshed and ready for another day. Being a relative light weight, I only need a couple of hits.”
“Very good high and pain control”
“Have to agree that this is a Fast Hitting strain. Nice sweet Taste of berry for me. Instant Full Body Pain Relief, feel cozy AF! Top of the list somewhere ;)”
“Excellent strain instant high that creeps up on sweet scent and taste that burns your chest when your toking. This strain had me hearing voices and made me take two naps in day”
“Really puts you on your ass. I always end up crashing hard after and falling asleep. Creeps up on you but it's also quite an instant high. Classic I'm stoned" feel. Would deff recommend.”"
“Made me feel quite a bit dizzy.  Super sleepy.  Did do the job and get me high.  And taste wise, it's phenomenal.”

“Experience: Heavy body relaxation, sleep
Usage: Bedtime bowls.
Look/Feel: Tiny lime green leaves & brown hairs have a yellow glow due to the thick coating of small crystals covering the very dense buds. 
Smell: Citrusy skunky fresh piney sweet pungent floral aroma.
Taste/Smoke: Fruity, spicy, peppery, medium-heavy smoke”
“Low key. Chilled out. Sweet and tangy.”
“very powerful indica”

“Grabbed a couple of rolls on my way to some springs. After I smoked the entire roll while waiting outside; I must agree that this has an incredibly smooth start. Does creep in.  Mood uplifting. Did cause some dizziness and I did develop headache! I hate headaches and NEVER get them. Otherwise, this was my favourite strain by far. Loved the flavour. Loved the high. Wish the headache didn’t come with it!”
“Love it...but creeps up quick.”
“One of the best strains out there. very good high overall. Very similar to blue dream but I like the cross.”
“Not my favorite, as it made me a bit dizzy, which I haven't experienced before. Relaxing. Full body effect. I recommend for night time pain relief.”

“This strain is, simply put, tasty. I like the taste of berries in it mostly. I would definitely recommend this strain for an all day smoking strain, due to the mellowness of the high. I will be smoking this some more now. Cheers!”
“Probably didn't get the best grown herb of this strain but still pretty decent body high. Not feeling it in my head though at all ..”
“Really good..but it creeps up fast..”
“Relaxing and very potent indica strain.”
“Awesome strain. Made me very relaxed and happy. Smelled like berry's to me. loved it”
“Great strain, I've been smoking on it for a few weeks and don't plan on stopping anytime soon.”
“Ohhhhyeeeaaaahhh! Delicious crumble with a satisfying melt. Bubbly and smooth and deep setting indica feel.”
